Description: When opening the terminal via Win+R or the Run program on a modern computer, both Terminal and the original cmd are opened simultaneously, but Terminal does not function properly (the window appears transparent). I would like to restore the original settings so that only Terminal opens when launching the terminal via either of the above methods and functions normally. How should I proceed? Alternatively, could you tell me what is causing this issue?
Title: I encountered a problem that greatly affected the experience.
EnhancedContent: When opening the terminal via Win+R or the Run program on a modern computer, both Terminal and the original cmd are opened simultaneously, but Terminal does not function properly (the window appears transparent). I would like to restore the original settings so that only Terminal opens when launching the terminal via either of the above methods and functions normally. How should I proceed? Alternatively, could you tell me what is causing this issue?
